name: Streams Master
tagline: Utility to control the active application's volume with the volume keys and ctrl, under Windows
body:
![Streams Master logo](http://i.imgur.com/mmOggUl.png)

Developed by André Ferreira.

Using code from  Karel Čapek, Max Bolingbroke and  Richard Carr.  
Referencing the [.Net CoreAudio library](https://netcoreaudio.codeplex.com/).  
Icon by 'http://www.elegantthemes.com'.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
